metadata.name: monastic tonsure
metadata.description:
The moment when a person takes monastic vows. Vows of celibacy, obedience and poverty. The moment when the world becomes dead to the monk.

Created for the AI Surrealism exhibition at Oculus NYC, hosted by Superchief Gallery NFT and Exquisite Workers. The largest AI art show in history, featuring 100 AI artists, June 2-8, 2023. Curated by Anna Dart and Roger Haus.
